title: Ziggs Arcade Blast game crash
body: I install the game but he every time says "Fatal Error" Crashed.

replies.body:
Hey, VladoLOL

I had the same problem. I figured out that they have two places to download it. One will give you the original, and another will give you the 64bit version.  I tried original and it didn't work. However, the 64bit version did.

Original Link: https://www.riotgames.com/articles/20170822/2423/riot-thunderdome-48-hours-make-and-ship-mini-game

64 bit version: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/thunderdome-team-pvc/niZ1zuNk-shipped-ziggs-arcade-blast-an-arcade-themed-2d-platformer-made-in-48-hours-with-your-input

There also seems to be a third version as well... ( I think it is an older one but it says editorial update, so I'm not sure):
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/thunderdome-team-pvc/VEKq8mo2-the-final-countdown-editorial-update

I hope this works for you!

Baramo out!

Sooooo if you didn't know that game was a spur of the moment, 48 hour project run by Riot to see what type of projects they could come up with. You should be able to download that zip file, and then simply run the executable to start the game. No install needed! 

If you're still having problems, go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I can't promise they'll be able to get this running for you, since we don't officially provide support for that project, but it's worth a shot!
